{{cpp/title|feclearexcept}}
{{cpp/numeric/fenv/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header | cfenv}}
{{dcl | since=c++11 |
int feclearexcept( int excepts );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Attempts to clear the floating-point exceptions that are listed in the bitmask argument {{tt|excepts}}, which is a bitwise OR of the [[cpp/numeric/fenv/FE_exceptions|floating point exception macros]].

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | excepts | bitmask listing the exception flags to clear}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|0}} if all indicated exceptions were successfully cleared or if {{tt|excepts}} is zero. Returns a non-zero value on error.
